website_summaries.verdict: Cloud access, Wi-Fi connectivity, and an external USB port in addition to the company's mobile printing app make the Epson WorkForce WF-2540 a good fit for smaller work-groups and start-ups with moderate printing needs.
pros: An external USB port on the Epson WorkForce WF-2540 gives standalone copying and scanning functionality on top of standard printing duties, and Epson's cloud printing suite adds remote printing capability
cons: The printer ships with small capacity "starter" ink cartridges, and the flimsy plastic hinge on the scanner doesn't inspire confidence in its long-term durability

customer_reviews.title: Top loaded All In One is hard to Find - This one works okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer used and had to get a cleaner kit to unclog the black printer head. Also, the ADF does not work but that's okay. I wanted a top load All In One (with fax) printer (for paper) with a small footprint. This fit the bill. The secret to keeping the printer heads unclogged is to use the printer regularly AND turn it off every day. I've had Epsons, Canons, HPs and Brother ink jet printers for 40 years and only had trouble with an Epson 410 rarely used.
customer_reviews.author: emklees

customer_reviews.title: Too cumbersome to use
customer_reviews.text: This printer was too complex and difficult to use. It worked for a while but in the past 2 years it stopped working altogether. It cannot print wirelessly and no longer can copy as all the sheets come out blank even though it has plenty of ink and has been cleaned. They advertise it as a workforce but for me it was a pain in the rear. I rely on my Brother printer connected by cable to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Givon

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product! Just one thing
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a few years and has worked good. We also do have a cover for it cause where we live is very dusty so it helps. It does not grab thick paper well but standard thin paper works good. Over all it was what we needed because our old one was shot.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: The printer that scams you.
customer_reviews.text: How am I always out of color ink if I never print from those cartridges? Why do I need to replace the color cartridges to print in black and white? I DO NOT NEED COLOR, EPSON. JUST LET ME PRINT.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Keeps going, and going, and going.
customer_reviews.text: When I buy a printer, durability and longevity are keys to my satisfaction. I also appreciate the ability to buy cheap ink cartridges. I have been using this printer for almost 5 years and it still works perfectly. I am not a heavy printer, but I use it at least weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis6767

customer_reviews.title: LIKE AN OLD CAR THAT DRAINS YOUR INK
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I bought this printer for college to print out last minute papers with all the features just in case. I would not recommend this to anyone! I bought an ink cartage less than a month and was only able to print a couple of pages before all the ink dried up... On top of that, there is an option to print temporary in black but that option doesn't even work. I also had to do head cleaning ever time i dont use it more than 3 days. The next time I would get a high quality printer with better ink efficiency so I don't burn through cartages every single month.
customer_reviews.author: Bingbong

customer_reviews.title: It's garbage.
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy their expensive ink, I had aftermarket ink in it and it was working fine till I let it do the supposedly needed update then it would no longer recongnize the ink.
customer_reviews.author: harvey eddy

customer_reviews.title: Inkpig
customer_reviews.text: It was good at first. I loved how it could print wirelessly. I've had it for less than a month. I haven't been printing a ton, but I have been printing. It just told me that ink levels are low already. It won't accept any orders for printing. SO essentially, any redeeming quality it has is overseen by these blatantly terrible ones. I needed a wireless printer for work, school and home. This isn't a workforce. THe name should be changed. It should be something along the lines of inkpig.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT Recommend Due to Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This printer appealed to me for the top-loading scanning capability, but I am very dissatisfied with the pages that go through the printer. Even with new ink cartridges, I cannot make the printer use a high enough quality to produce an image that resembles the document being printed. The colors are faded, incomplete, and always look as if I am running out of ink. Very disappointed with the low quality of this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Sign Girl

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality and the low price.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been pleased with Epson products. I rarely purchase refurbs of any product, but I thought I'd go out on a limb this time. I couldn't pass on the extended warranty for such a low price. Does a good job for money. A friend of mine bought one at full price for his home office last year, I'm not going to tell him how much less I paid.
customer_reviews.author: JShackleford

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to throw it away in 60 days.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on June 1st, died July 28th. The printer/ink module destroyed the ribbon cable that controls the print head. Made a big slamming sound and and says paper jam but I can clearly see the smaller ribbon cable is destroyed. I was using only the provided ink cartridges. I have printed <50 sheets so far, when it did print it printed crooked (uncalibrated paper feeder?). Spent the last 25 minutes trying to find their warranty information online with no useful information. Don't have the patience or time right now to call their customer service line. Guess I find a Kinkos and order an HP next time.
customer_reviews.author: Will iii

customer_reviews.title: Extended Warranty's are VERY DIFFICULT TO effect a claim.  You pay, but no help with claim.
customer_reviews.text: ADF Broke within six month. Purchased with 2 year extended warranty. Very difficult to get anyone at amazon to respond other than to cycle you around webpages without helping fix or replace defective unit and effect warranty. Awaiting email from amazon to see if they solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lasting value
customer_reviews.text: It has lasted me years. Great quality and awesome low price. 😮 wow
customer_reviews.author: Wind

customer_reviews.title: This is a great home printer scanner copier and fax
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these, for some reason it kept getting an error message. Tech support could not figure it out replaced it, and sending mine back to manufacturer. This is a great home printer scanner copier and fax. As with any product, something can go wrong. In this case for all I know my little boy could have done something to it. I highly recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ooghe

customer_reviews.title: Printer stopped printing after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Printer worked fine for a few weeks. Then a firmware update was downloaded. Subsequently, the printer started printed and the ink level was decreasing rapidly. Then all of a sudden, with about half ink on levels, the printer stopped working. I tried cleaning, aligning, nozzle checking, etc. Printer refuses to printer. I won't purchase another epson ever again, unless consumer reviews are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Trying to set it up, it just walks me ...
customer_reviews.text: Trying to set it up, it just walks me in circles. Not intuitive, And jeeze is it slow! It takes a long time to do anything. Printing? Forget it! I am only using it to scan images now to send to a CNC machine. For printing I now have a cheap laser unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dobiedude

customer_reviews.title: A Good, Basic printer
customer_reviews.text: A good machine if you only need one for occasional printing. I bought an Epson because the ink is cheaper and the quality is fine for what I need. If I want to print more copies, I use the big one down the hall. Good price and Wi-Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Like pouring your ink money into a black hole!!!
customer_reviews.text: You better have your wallet open and your temperment cooled down to own this piece of junk. This printer eats ink cartridges. The print head clogs and cannot be cleared without a major take apart. If one cartridge shows no ink then after installing a new cartridge all the others won't work after it charges and reboots the ink level system. I have never had a printer that worked the greatest when first opened and later became the piece of junk that I can't use because the ink level shows empty after sitting with a new cartridge in for over 2 weeks. Go buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Susman

customer_reviews.title: I have been using printers and expect at least 50+ pages however never expected it to be that bad from Epson
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it and took 10 Page black print outs and the printer is asking for a new cartridge. I have been using printers and expect at least 50+ pages however never expected it to be that bad from Epson. Not recommended or buy an extra cartridge. Also I just took the blank prints and other cartridges are showing only 75% filled
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for cheap money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's not the fastest printer out there, but that wasn't why I bought it. Google Cloud printing and the iPrint software are great. I print stuff from my phone and tablet all the time and its sitting for me on my printer when I get home from work. Color stuff looks fairly good. Again, it's not a photo printer. If you want that, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan V

customer_reviews.title: Can't give it less than 1 star or I would ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't give it less than 1 star or I would!! They'd owe me stars!! We've had 3 of these so far and have yet to print a single sheet of paper. Now our ink is out?! I don't know how that is possible?!?! It also see all my neighbor's networks but not mine. Dicks!
customer_reviews.author: WBA

customer_reviews.title: This is the WORST printer I have ever owned (and I have owned ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the WORST printer I have ever owned (and I have owned a few). I constantly have to clean the print heads just to make a readable copy - uses up immense amounts of ink. I have already purchased a replacement HP printer and am only using this one until I use up all the ink cartridges I have - which shouldn't actually take very long. Pass this one by - cheap to buy doesn't always mean inexpensive to use.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have another one the same model and I wanted to have one for my wife's computer but also in business so if one fails I always have a back up and they both use the #200 ink.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine, but is quite noisy when it starts to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered when promised. Works just fine, but is quite noisy when it starts to print. But prints clear, good prints and copies. The price was good.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Walker

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CAMPER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRINTER, I'VE BOUGHT THREE OFF THEM SO FAR. ALL THREE WORK GREAT. BEST FEATURE IS INK REPLACEMENTS ARE AFFORDABLE. QUALITY IS GREAT, PRICE WAS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE YATES

customer_reviews.title: Epsom printer WF-2540
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the printer which I purchased to replace the same make & mode that I previously had. It was easy to set up & is working well.
customer_reviews.author: P0atJ

customer_reviews.title: This printer replaced an older Epson all-in-1 printer. We ...
customer_reviews.text: This printer replaced an older Epson all-in-1 printer. We wanted a printer that would work on our wireless home network. Now we all can share one printer using out iPhones, tablets, laptops and desktop computers. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Denver B Kennison II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inl as usual is expensive generics don't seem to be capatable
customer_reviews.author: Dean Martin

customer_reviews.title: This Printer is a piece of CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: This lasted for 31 days and of course it had a 30 day return policy. I have unsuccessfully tried to contact Amazon to get it replaced! Buy at your own risk....
customer_reviews.author: Dale Frieden

customer_reviews.title: cheap printer...cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Returned after 3 days, nozzles clogged, no color would print. Waste of money, even more a waste of money buying ink.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Got this one to replace one which had died, but had lots of ink left. So far unable to tell that it is not a new unit. Got a good printer for not much more than the cost of a new set of ink.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis John Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, waste of time, a box of Crayola's, my 4 yr. old niece, and a chocolate chip cookie will get more printing completed than that piece of s***!
customer_reviews.author: truth

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: these keep breaking, I purchased a bunch of ink so keep buying the same one.
customer_reviews.author: scottatl

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one printer for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best printer I have ever owned. It's fast. Small footprint. It prints from tablets and android smart phones. Easy to use and you only need to replace the ink cartridge you need. Nice job Epson. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Great printer, easy to set up. The wireless part was so simple my 6 year old figured it out and now tries so print everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer if it came complete
customer_reviews.text: Missing part, cannot use, beeb 2 weeks no part yet
customer_reviews.author: Walter LENARTOWICZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Easy to set up and easy to use. The replacement cartridges are reasonable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Henry

customer_reviews.title: ... the printer have problem with a print head not good quanity refurbished
customer_reviews.text: one of the printer have problem with a print head not good quanity refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: RENE HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: second one! Replaced old WF-2540 with new one! ...
customer_reviews.text: second one! Replaced old WF-2540 with new one! Does it all!!
customer_reviews.author: lukesuther2

customer_reviews.title: waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Very diappointing, i have not even used it, i just set it up and power just turned off, how can i even rate this, i dont think i can even give one star, now how will i return this?
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up but the printer does not print properly
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up but the printer does not print properly. It leaves a line that is not complete with ink. I have cleaned the head, etc just as the manual states but it didn't make a difference. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY

customer_reviews.title: Good, except . . . ..
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is that it doesn't like ink cartridges that are NOT Epson (and those are, of course, more than twice as expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome printer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! The delivery was quick, and the printer works amazing. I'm able to print documents, pictures and more!
customer_reviews.author: jonti mcelroy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sidnt connect to my wifi so it was useless and i returned it. Might have been a fluke
customer_reviews.author: RIVKY612

customer_reviews.title: So far so good I have no problem with this item as
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I have no problem with this item as yet
customer_reviews.author: martin lawrence

product_meta.title: Epson WorkForce All-In-One Wireless Color Inkjet Printer WF-2540, Black
product_meta.description:
Engineered for Business. Offering the smallest footprint in its class, this sleek all-in-one features fast print speeds. It offers a 2.5-Inch LCD, mobile device printing and wired and wireless connectivity.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


WORKFORCE WF-2540 ALL-IN-ONE PRINTER
PRINT | COPY | SCAN | FAX | ETHERNET | WI-FI
WHY BUY?
Enlarge ENGINEERED FOR BUSINESS
Ideal for the space-constrained home office, the WorkForce WF-2540 is a fast, high-performance all-in-one that offers affordable, individual ink cartridges and a space saving, compact design — the smallest in its class. Featuring a 2.5" LCD for easy navigation, the WF-2540 saves time with fast speeds of 9 ISO ppm (black) and 4.7 ISO ppm (color), plus a convenient, 30-page Automatic Document Feeder. The WF-2540 comes with both wired and built-in wireless connectivity for easy setup and sharing on your network. And, it includes EPSON Connect so you can print and scan from anywhere.




FEATURES
Built-in Wi-Fi CERTIFIED n plus Ethernet

Smallest footprint in its class

USB port for easy file transfers & sharing of documents

EPSON Connect — convenient mobile printing from smartphones, tablets & more




FEATURES
Easy
2.5” LCD for menu navigation

Productive
Auto Document Feeder to copy, scan & fax

Connectivity
Built-in wireless & Ethernet networking

EPSON Connect
Convenient mobile printing from smartphones, tablets & more

Fast
High-speed printing

Professional
Smudge, fade & water resistant prints

Affordable
Individual ink cartridges replace only the color you need




WHAT IS ISO PPM?
Print speed is critically important when buying a printer or all-in-one. But how do you compare print speeds when different manufacturers measure it in different ways? Now you can. Much like “MPG” ratings on new cars, there’s now an industry standard for measuring print speed, which allows for an “apples-to-apples” comparison between different printer models and brands. The International Organization for Standardization (widely known as ISO) developed this industry-approved and internationally accepted standard, specifically for inkjet printers and all-in-ones. It measures “out of the box” (default) print speeds using “real world” printing scenarios, so you can be sure you’re getting a product that performs at the speed you need.




ADDITIONAL FEATURES
 * Sharp documents — laser quality black text delivers crisp, high quality proposals, reports and brochures
 * Convenience — the included OCR software also allows you to scan and save documents as text-searchable, editable PDFs
 * High-speed faxing in black and color — as fast as 3 sec per page; speed dial storage up to 60 numbers; fax memory up to 180 pages
 * PC-Fax — fax documents directly to/from your computer
 * Save energy — uses up to 70% less power than laser printers
 * Product protection you can count on — phone support, without charge, for the life of the product; plus, get free templates and “how to” tutorials
 * Packaging Specifications (W x D x H) — Dimensions: Printing 15.4" x 21.3" x 11.5", Storage 15.4" x 14.8" x 8.7" and Weight 13 lb.




WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * WorkForce WF-2540 All-in-One
 * Instruction manual
 * CD-ROM with drivers & bonus software
 * Power cord
 * Telephone cord
 * DURABrite Ultra Cartridges: Four 200-series: Black, Cyan, Magenta, Yellow

EPSON INK SUPPLIES
 * 200 DURABrite Ultra Black ink cartridge, Standard-capacity (T200120)
 * 200 DURABrite Ultra Cyan ink cartridge, Standard-capacity (T200220)
 * 200 DURABrite Ultra Magenta ink cartridge Standard-capacity (T200320)
 * 200 DURABrite Ultra Yellow ink cartridge, Standard-capacity (T200420)
 * 200 DURABrite Ultra Color MultiPack, Standard-capacity (T200520)

EPSON PAPER SUPPLIES
 * Premium Presentation Paper Matte 8.5 x 11 in, 50 sheets (S041257)
 * Bright White Paper 8.5 x 11 in, 500 sheets (S041586)
 * Presentation Paper Matte 8.5 x 11 in, 100 sheets (S041062)
 * Premium Photo Paper Semi-gloss 8.5 x 11 in, 20 sheets (S041331)
 * Premium Photo Paper Glossy 4 x 6 in, 100 sheets (S041727)




ECO FEATURES
 * Recyclable product
 * Uses up to 70% less power than laser printers
 * Save up to 50% on paper with manual, 2-sided printing
 * ENERGY STAR qualified
 * Epson America, Inc. is a SmartWay Transport partner
